channel.title: check state on Bucket's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in check state on Bucket's Notes

item.title: checking system state
item.description: htop check processes running lsb_release -a check linux version uname -a some more system specs inc OS and architecture deets cat /proc/version cat /proc/cpuinfo, lscpu look at cpu specs lspci / lshw | grep video find out about the graphics card cat /proc/meminfo free -m check ram df -h free space on disk who roles -v finger
